titleStmt.title: A briefe discourse, touching the happie vnion of the kingdomes of England, and Scotland Dedicated in priuate to his Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Read] for Fœlix Norton, and are to be sold by William Aspley,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last three leaves are blank.
Running title reads: The happy vnion of England and Scotland.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
